item.title: Kaylee add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by Gordon B. Hinkley
item.description: "Life is to be enjoyed, not just endured" -- Gordon B. Hinkley

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "Find joy in the journey." -- Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "Don't forget: one of the saddest things in life is wasted talent." -- Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "He who gives money gives some, he who gives time gives more, and he who gives of himself gives all." -- Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "Choose your love. Love your choice." -- Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "The past is behind, learn from it. The future is ahead, prepare for it. The present is here, live it." -- Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by Stephen Schwartz
item.description: "....Everyone deserves a chance to fly!" -- Stephen Schwartz

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by Stephen Schwartz
item.description: "It's just life, so keep dancing through." -- Stephen Schwartz

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by Stephen Schwartz
item.description: "No, you're wrong. I'm a hundred percent callow and deeply shallow." -- Stephen Schwartz

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It was, he thought, the difference between being dragged into the arena to face a battle to the death and walking into the arena with your head held high. Some people, perhaps, would say that there was little to choose between the two ways, but Dumbledore knew - and so do I, thought Harry, with a rush of fierce pride, and so did my parents - that there was all the difference in the world." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "We're all human, aren't we? Every human life is worth the same, and worth saving." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Albus Severus," Harry said quietly, so that nobody but Ginny could hear, and she was tactful enough to pretend to be waving to Rose, who was now on the train, "you were named for two headmasters of Hogwarts. One of them was a Slytherin and he was probably the bravest man I ever knew." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "<i>Ginny!</i>" said Mr. Weasley, flabbergasted. "Haven't I taught you <i>anything</i>? What have I always told you? Never trust anything that can think for itself <i>if you can't see where it keeps its brain</i>?" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Kaylee add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "I solemnly swear that I am up to no good." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "The truth." Dumbledore sighed. "It is a beautiful and terrible thing, and should therefore be treated with great caution." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Kaylee add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Mr. Moony presents his compliments to Professor Snape, and begs him to keep his abnormally large nose out of other people's business. Mr. Prongs agrees with Mr. Moony, and would like to add that Professor Snape is an ugly git. Mr. Padfoot would like to register his astonishment that an idiot like that ever became a professor. Mr. Wormtail bids Professor Snape good day, and advises him to wash his hair, the slimeball." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean that it is not real?" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness, nothing more." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Do not pity the dead, Harry. Pity the living, and, above all those who live without love." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kaylee add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Holey? You have the the whole world of ear-related humor before you, you go for holey?" -- J.K. Rowling
